CustomField.description: The largest (partial soft-credit) gift from this Account. See "Combined Largest Gift Amount" for largest gift overall (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The largest (partial soft-credit) gift from this Account. See "Combined Largest Gift Amount" for largest gift overall (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.label: Largest Partial Soft Credit Amount
